original: Saraṇaṁ pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.🔽Araṇaṁ pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.🔽Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: saraṇam pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi  araṇam pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka  hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate cattāri
translated: With the dyad on the refuges, there are three triplets, three tetrads, and so on as in the case of the dyad on the jhānas.🔽The Dyad on Joy

original: Saraṇaṁ sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: saraṇam sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na sukha sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With the dyad on joy, there are three triplets, three tetrads, and so on as in the case of the dyad on the jhānas.

original: Araṇaṁ sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na sukha sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate cattāri
translated: With the dyad on happiness, there are three triplets, three tetrads, and so on as in the case of the dyad on the jhānas.

original: Saraṇaṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: saraṇam upekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na upekkhā sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate cattāri
translated: With the non-object of equanimity as condition … With the object of equanimity as condition … With the non-object of equanimity as condition … With the object of equanimity as condition …
